Posts.Content: I am a 17 year survivor of BC. Double breast mastectomy 1995, Lung 2005, subclavical area 2012. My tumor markers were 77.7 and now after 3 rounds of chemo it is 66.3. 6 rounds of erubilin and then I retest. My tumor was missed on an August 2010 cat scan. I would like to know anyone who is on erubilin and their success with it.
Posts.Title: Anyone taking Erubilan? (Halaven)
